function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Challenges in contact tracing process, including identification, privacy violation, and monitoring.","Impact":"Ineffective contact tracing can lead to uncontrolled spread of contagious diseases.","Mitigation":"Implement strict protocols for contact tracing, ensure privacy protection, and provide adequate training for contact tracing personnel.","Technologies":"GPS tracking, mobile applications for contact tracing, and data encryption for privacy protection.","People":"Contact-persons, contact tracing personnel, and general public.","Owner":"Healthcare organizations, government agencies, and technology companies."},{"Description":"Lack of physical addresses, street names, and identification cards for contact-persons.","Impact":"Difficulty in locating and enrolling contact-persons for contact tracing.","Mitigation":"Use geolocation technologies, community outreach programs, and alternative identification methods for contact-persons.","Technologies":"Geolocation services, community mapping tools, and biometric identification systems.","People":"Contact-persons, contact tracing personnel, and community leaders.","Owner":"Local government authorities, community organizations, and technology providers."},{"Description":"Increased exposure of contact tracing personnel to COVID-19 and potential stigmatization.","Impact":"Higher risk of infection and reluctance from personnel to engage in contact tracing activities.","Mitigation":"Provide personal protective equipment (PPE), mental health support, and stigma reduction training for contact tracing personnel.","Technologies":"Biometric screening, remote monitoring, and telehealth services for mental health support.","People":"Contact tracing personnel, healthcare workers, and support staff.","Owner":"Healthcare institutions, mental health organizations, and government health departments."}]}
